title: "An Intervention, but for Dungeons & Dragons" - with Jeff Cannata
itunes:title: "An Intervention, but for Dungeons & Dragons" - with Jeff Cannata
description:
An origins story, dealing with time travel, double spikes, and Key & Peele as pirates. It's all here as this week we are joined by the King of Podcasts and DM for The Dungeon Run, Jeff Cannata.


Jeff Cannata @jeffcannata

The Dungeon Run @thedungeonrun


If you enjoy this podcast please help us out by leaving a review and sharing with your fellow adventurers.

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for your Shirefolk Shoutout and Bonus Episodes.

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram and Facebook @tbhalflings, on our Discord or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
